mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of preposition: I found my shoes under the bed., I found my shoes in the bed., I found my shoes on the bed., I found my shoes above the bed.

options.a: I found my shoes under the bed.
options.b: I found my shoes in the bed.
options.c: I found my shoes on the bed.
options.d: I found my shoes above the bed.
